summary: A love story between a professional thief and a prep student from a wealthy family.
cast: Juan José Ballesta|María Valverde|Patrick Bauchau|Carlos Kaniowsky|Christian Sampedro|Álex Cansinos|María Ballesteros|Erik Probanza|Cristina de Inza|Cristóbal Pinto|Manuel Andrés|Silvia García|Eduardo Velasco|Mikel Tello|Txema Sandoval|Lucas Fuica
director: Director: Jaime Marques (as Jaime Marques Olarreaga)
title: Ladrones
